sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Chairman.css'; const Chairman = () => { return (

From the Desk of Chairman

Your Vision, Our Inspiration

President – Shri Raju Anant Patil

Dear Students and Parents,
Welcome to Smt. Chadrabai Anant Patil Eng. Med. High School and Eng. Med. Jr. College, Parivar

The foundation of Smt. Chadrabai Anant Patil Eng. Med. High School and Eng. Med. Jr. College was laid by Shri. Raju Anant Patil and the founder of “Shetkari Unnati Mandal Trust” in Kalher, District – Thane in the year 2018. It was the beginning of various educational institutions to grow in the future as the large campus of Smt. Chadrabai Anant Patil Eng. Med. High School and Eng. Med. Jr. College Educational Institutions in Kalher- Bhiwandi, Thane.

The management of Shetkari Unnati Mandal is fully and completely from an educational background, running this institute since 1959. With a commitment to provide quality learning experiences to every child connected with us, we believe in offering meaningful learning opportunities. We ensure that students grow up to be talented individuals through holistic education, hard work, and determination.

“Good education gives children the wings to fly and fulfill their dreams.” Ensuring a bright future, our motto is “To see the smile on the faces which are attached to us,” to build the leaders of tomorrow. Value-based education is the essence of learning at Smt. Chadrabai Anant Patil Eng. Med. High School and Eng. Med. Jr. College.

I invite you to explore this website thoroughly to understand our key focus areas and the measures we take to provide high-quality education to our students.

Shri. Raju Anant Patil

); }; export default Chairman;
